Bash(__NEW_LINE__ python3 -c "
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont

def create_professional_image(filename, color, text_lines, size=(300, 300)):
    # Create circular portrait-style image
    img = Image.new(''RGB'', size, color)
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
    
    try:
        font_large = ImageFont.truetype(''/System/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf'', 24)
        font_small = ImageFont.truetype(''/System/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf'', 16)
    except:
        font_large = ImageFont.load_default()
        font_small = ImageFont.load_default()
    
    # Draw circular background
    margin = 20
    draw.ellipse([margin, margin, size[0]-margin, size[1]-margin], fill=(255, 255, 255, 50))
    
    # Add text
    y_offset = size[1] // 2 - 30
    for i, line in enumerate(text_lines):
        font = font_large if i == 0 else font_small
        bbox = draw.textbbox((0, 0), line, font=font)
        x = (size[0] - (bbox[2] - bbox[0])) // 2
        y = y_offset + (i * 35)
        draw.text((x, y), line, fill=''white'', font=font)
    
    img.save(filename, ''JPEG'', quality=95)
    print(f''✅ Created: {filename}'')

# Create testimonial profile images
print(''Creating employee testimonial images...'')
create_professional_image(''images/careers/testimonial_priya.jpg'', (124, 58, 237), [''Priya Sharma'', ''HR Manager''])
create_professional_image(''images/careers/testimonial_rajesh.jpg'', (34, 197, 94), [''Rajesh Kumar'', ''Production Lead''])

# Create culture collaboration image
def create_culture_image(filename, color, text_lines, size=(500, 350)):
    img = Image.new(''RGB'', size, color)
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
    
    try:
        font_large = ImageFont.truetype(''/System/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf'', 32)
        font_small = ImageFont.truetype(''/System/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf'', 20)
    except:
        font_large = ImageFont.load_default()
        font_small = ImageFont.load_default()
    
    y_offset = size[1] // 2 - 40
    for i, line in enumerate(text_lines):
        font = font_large if i == 0 else font_small
        bbox = draw.textbbox((0, 0), line, font=font)
        x = (size[0] - (bbox[2] - bbox[0])) // 2
        y = y_offset + (i * 50)
        draw.text((x, y), line, fill=''white'', font=font)
    
    img.save(filename, ''JPEG'', quality=95)
    print(f''✅ Created: {filename}'')

create_culture_image(''images/careers/culture_collaboration.jpg'', (59, 130, 246), [''Team Collaboration'', ''Working Together''])

print(''\n✅ All career testimonial images created!'')
print(''- testimonial_priya.jpg (Purple - HR Manager)'')
print(''- testimonial_rajesh.jpg (Green - Production Lead)'')  
print(''- culture_collaboration.jpg (Blue - Team Collaboration)'')
")

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont

def create_csr_program_image(filename, color, text_lines, size=(400, 300)):
    img = Image.new(''RGB'', size, color)
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
    
    try:
        font_large = ImageFont.truetype(''/System/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf'', 28)
        font_small = ImageFont.truetype(''/System/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf'', 18)
    except:
        font_large = ImageFont.load_default()
        font_small = ImageFont.load_default()
    
    y_offset = size[1] // 2 - 40
    for i, line in enumerate(text_lines):
        font = font_large if i == 0 else font_small
        bbox = draw.textbbox((0, 0), line, font=font)
        x = (size[0] - (bbox[2] - bbox[0])) // 2
        y = y_offset + (i * 45)
        draw.text((x, y), line, fill=''white'', font=font)
    
    img.save(filename, ''JPEG'', quality=95)
    print(f''✅ Created: {filename}'')

print(''Creating CSR Education program images...'')
create_csr_program_image(''images/csr/education/school-infrastructure.jpg'', (22, 163, 74), [''School Infrastructure'', ''Development Project''])
create_csr_program_image(''images/csr/education/digital-literacy.jpg'', (59, 130, 246), [''Digital Literacy'', ''Training Program''])
create_csr_program_image(''images/csr/education/skill-training-center.jpg'', (124, 58, 237), [''Skill Training'', ''Vocational Center''])

print(''\nCreating CSR Healthcare program images...'')
create_csr_program_image(''images/csr/healthcare/mobile-health-clinic.jpg'', (220, 38, 38), [''Mobile Health'', ''Clinic Services''])
create_csr_program_image(''images/csr/healthcare/health-camp.jpg'', (239, 68, 68), [''Health Awareness'', ''Community Camp''])

print(''\nCreating CSR Rural Development program images...'')
create_csr_program_image(''images/csr/rural-development/water-conservation.jpg'', (8, 145, 178), [''Water Conservation'', ''Rural Project''])
create_csr_program_image(''images/csr/rural-development/farmers-training.jpg'', (34, 197, 94), [''Farmers Training'', ''Agricultural Program''])

print(''\n✅ All CSR program images created!'')
print(''Education: 3 program images'')
print(''Healthcare: 2 program images'') 
print(''Rural Development: 2 program images'')
print(''Total: 7 professional CSR program images'')

Bash(__NEW_LINE__ python3 -c "
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont

def create_leadership_portrait(filename, color, name, title, size=(300, 400)):
    img = Image.new(''RGB'', size, color)
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
    
    try:
        font_name = ImageFont.truetype(''/System/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf'', 22)
        font_title = ImageFont.truetype(''/System/Library/Fonts/Arial.ttf'', 16)
    except:
        font_name = ImageFont.load_default()
        font_title = ImageFont.load_default()
    
    # Draw professional background
    margin = 30
    draw.rectangle([margin, margin, size[0]-margin, size[1]-margin], outline=''white'', width=3)
    
    # Add text at bottom
    y_name = size[1] - 80
    y_title = size[1] - 50
    
    # Center the text
    name_bbox = draw.textbbox((0, 0), name, font=font_name)
    title_bbox = draw.textbbox((0, 0), title, font=font_title)
    
    x_name = (size[0] - (name_bbox[2] - name_bbox[0])) // 2
    x_title = (size[0] - (title_bbox[2] - title_bbox[0])) // 2
    
    # Draw text with background
    draw.rectangle([10, y_name-10, size[0]-10, size[1]-10], fill=(0, 0, 0, 180))
    draw.text((x_name, y_name), name, fill=''white'', font=font_name)
    draw.text((x_title, y_title), title, fill=''white'', font=font_title)
    
    img.save(filename, ''JPEG'', quality=95)
    print(f''✅ Created: {filename}'')

# Create leadership portraits
print(''Creating new leadership team portraits...'')
create_leadership_portrait(''nawab_raza_chairman.jpg'', (59, 130, 246), ''Mr. Nawab Raza'', ''Founder & Chairman'')
create_leadership_portrait(''saif_raza_md.jpg'', (124, 58, 237), ''Mr. Saif Raza'', ''Managing Director'')

print(''\n✅ New leadership portraits created!'')
print(''- nawab_raza_chairman.jpg (Blue - Founder & Chairman)'')
print(''- saif_raza_md.jpg (Purple - Managing Director)'')
")
